definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

pinyin: Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Min2 zu2 Quan2 li4 Ji1 gou4
containing_words.word: 巴勒斯坦民族權力機構

sentences.english: With that overturned, the clan authority and the authority of the husband all begin to totter.
sentences.chinese: 它既被打翻，族權和夫權便一概跟着動搖起來。

sentences.english: It is a difficult and long-term task to break through the shackles of clan authority.
sentences.chinese: 要使壯族婚姻衝破族權的桎梏，任重而道遠。
